summary.span: 表示从 X.509 证书中提取与某个实体关联的声明的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of claims extracted from an X.509 certificate that are associated with an entity.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完 后调用 方法。Call the method when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 方法后，必须释放对 的所有引用，这样垃圾收集器才能收回 占用的内存。After calling the method, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the occupied. > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，不会释放正在使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

.property instance class System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet Issuer
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Issuer As ClaimSet
public: virtual property System::IdentityModel::Claims::ClaimSet ^ Issuer { System::IdentityModel::Claims::ClaimSet ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the issuer for this .
The issuer for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的颁发者遵循与 X.509 证书的 X.509 链相同的模型。The issuer for a follows the same model as the X.509 chain for an X.509 certificate. 例如，根 是自行颁发的，并映射到颁发机构。For instance, the root is self-issued and maps to a Certificate Authority. 如果证书链中的某个证书不可用，则根 为匿名颁发者。When a certificate in the chain is unavailable, the root is an anonymous issuer.
